text: Earl Preston "Buddy" Yates (born December 23, 1923) is an American rear admiral for the United States Navy. Yates was the youngest male graduate ever from the academy. He was a former commander of Fleet Air Wing 4. He was also the first commander of the USS John F. Kennedy (CV-67).http://www.navytimes.com/article/20070323/NEWS01/703230306/After- storied-career-JFK-s-saga-finally-ends He was born in Winston-Salem, North Carolina. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:People from Winston-Salem, North Carolina Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Military people from North Carolina
title: Earl P. Yates
